channel.title: YOJNA PORTAL 2025 - Govt Schemes & Sarkari Job Updates Daily
channel.description: Recent content on YOJNA PORTAL 2025 - Govt Schemes & Sarkari Job Updates Daily

item.title: IBPS Probationary Officer PO 15th Result 2025 – Check Preliminary Exam Results
item.description: The Institute of Banking Personnel Selection (IBPS) has released the notification for CRP PO/MT-XV Recruitment 2025 for the post of Probationary Officer (PO)/Management Trainee (MT). A total of 5208 vacancies have been announced across 8 participating public sector banks. Candidates who hold a Bachelor’s Degree in any discipline from a recognized university in India are eligible to apply. The recruitment process includes a preliminary exam, main exam, and interview. Applications must be submitted online through the official IBPS website www.ibps.in. Selected candidates will be appointed across various locations in India.

item.title: SSC Selection Post Phase 13 Answer Key 2025 Out
item.description: The Staff Selection Commission (SSC) has released the official notification for Selection Post Phase 13 Recruitment 2025, offering a total of 2,423 vacancies across various government departments and ministries. This recruitment drive is open to candidates with Matric (10th), Intermediate (12th), and Graduation level qualifications.

item.title: Delhi DDA Recruitment 2025
item.description: The Delhi Development Authority (DDA) has released its Recruitment Notification 2025 for a total of 1732 vacancies across various posts including Deputy Director, Assistant Director, Junior Engineer, Stenographer, Patwari, Mali, and Multi Tasking Staff (MTS). The online application process is scheduled from 06 October 2025 to 05 November 2025, and the Computer Based Test (CBT) is expected in December 2025 – January 2026. Candidates can apply online through the official DDA website. The recruitment includes category-wise vacancies (UR, EWS, SC, ST, OBC) and posts for ESM / PwBD candidates. Qualifications vary by post, ranging from 10th/12th pass to Graduate/Degree holders in relevant fields.

item.title: DRDO Apprentice Vacancy 2025
item.description: The DRDO Apprentice Recruitment 2025 has been officially announced by the Defence Research and Development Organisation (DRDO) for 195 apprentice vacancies at the Research Centre Imarat (RCI), Hyderabad. The recruitment includes Graduate Apprentices (40 posts), Technician/Diploma Apprentices (20 posts), and ITI Trade Apprentices (135 posts) under the Apprenticeship Act, 1961. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online from 27th September 2025 to 28th October 2025 through the official DRDO website. Selection will be based purely on academic merit followed by document verification, and no written exam will be conducted. Candidates with ITI, Diploma, or Graduation in relevant disciplines can apply. This is a great opportunity for freshers to gain valuable hands-on training and experience in India’s premier defence research organisation. Applicants are advised to carefully check the eligibility criteria, age limit, application process, and important dates before applying.

item.title: Bihar Police Sub Inspector Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Bihar Police Subordinate Services Commission (BPSSC) has released the Bihar Police SI Recruitment 2025 (Advt. No. 05/2025) for 1799 Sub-Inspector (SI) vacancies in the Home Department (Police Section), Government of Bihar. The pay scale for the post is Level-6 (₹35,400 – ₹1,12,400/-). Eligible candidates must hold a graduation degree from a recognized university by 01 August 2025. The age limit is 20–37 years for UR male candidates, 20–40 years for UR female/BC/EBC, and 20–42 years for SC/ST. The selection process includes a preliminary exam, main written exam, physical efficiency test, followed by document verification and medical test. The online application process will be open from 26 September 2025 to 26 October 2025, and the application fee is ₹100/- (payable online). Interested candidates can apply through the official website bpssc.bihar.gov.in.

item.title: MPESB Middle and Primary School Teacher Selection Test - 2024 Result
item.description: प्रवेश पत्र डाउनलोड करें

item.title: LIC AE, AAO Specialist & Generalist Pre Admit Card 2025
item.description: The Life Insurance Corporation of India (LIC) has announced the LIC AE & AAO Recruitment 2025 for a total of 841 vacancies. The recruitment includes posts for Assistant Engineer (Civil/Electrical), Assistant Administrative Officer (AAO Specialist – CA, CS, Actuarial, Legal, Insurance), and AAO Generalist. The online application process is open from 16/08/2025 to 08/09/2025. The Preliminary Exam will be held on 03/10/2025 followed by the Main Exam on 08/11/2025, while the Interview schedule will be announced later. Candidates with a Bachelor’s Degree in the relevant discipline (Engineering, Law, Finance, Actuarial Science, Company Secretary, Insurance, or any stream for Generalist) are eligible to apply. The application fee is ₹700 + GST + charges for General/OBC/EWS candidates and ₹85 + GST + charges for SC/ST/PwBD candidates. The selection process will be conducted in three stages: Prelims, Mains, and Interview.

item.title: IBPS CRP Clerk 15th Vacancy Pre Admit Card 2025
item.description: The IBPS Clerk 2025 (CRP-XV) notification has been released for the recruitment of Clerks (Customer Service Associates) in various Public Sector Banks across India. The application process is online, and the selection will be based on a two-stage examination: Prelims and Mains. Candidates must check the eligibility criteria, exam pattern, important dates, and state-wise vacancies before applying.

item.title: BSSC Stenographer Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Bihar Staff Selection Commission (BSSC) has released the official notification Advt. No. 07/2025 for the recruitment of 432 Stenographer and Stenotypist Grade-III posts in various departments and district offices. The minimum qualification required is Intermediate (10+2) or equivalent along with stenography (Hindi/English), typing, and basic computer knowledge. The selected candidates will get a salary in Pay Level-4 (₹25,500 – ₹81,100/-). The age limit is 18 to 37 years for UR male, 40 years for UR female, OBC and EBC candidates, and 42 years for SC/ST candidates, with 10 years of additional relaxation for PwD candidates. The application fee is ₹100/- to be paid online. The online registration will be open from 25th September 2025 to 5th November 2025, and the last date for fee payment is 3rd November 2025. Interested candidates can apply online only through the official website bssc.bihar.gov.in

item.title: Delhi Police Head Constable Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Staff Selection Commission (SSC) has released the notification for Delhi Police Head Constable (Assistant Wireless Operator/Tele-Printer Operator) Recruitment 2025. A total of 552 vacancies are available, including 370 posts for male candidates and 182 posts for female candidates. The online application process will remain open from 24 September to 15 October 2025. Candidates must have passed 10+2 with Science and Mathematics or hold an NTC in Mechanic-cum-Operator Electronic Communication System. The age limit is 18 to 27 years, with applicable relaxations for reserved categories. The selection process includes a Computer Based Examination, Physical Endurance & Measurement Test (PE&MT), Trade Test, and Computer Proficiency Test. The pay scale is Level-4 (₹25,500 – ₹81,100) as per the 7th CPC.

item.title: Delhi Police Constable Driver Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Staff Selection Commission (SSC) has released the notification for Delhi Police Constable (Driver) – Male Recruitment 2025 with 737 vacancies. Applications can be submitted online from 24/09/2025 to 15/10/2025. Candidates must have 10+2 qualification, a valid Heavy Motor Vehicle (HMV) driving license, and knowledge of vehicle maintenance.

item.title: PFRDA Assistant Manager Phase-I Result 2025
item.description: The Pension Fund Regulatory and Development Authority (PFRDA) has released the notification for the recruitment of 40 Assistant Manager (Grade A) posts in various streams including General, Finance, IT, Research, Legal, Actuary, and Official Language. Eligible candidates with qualifications such as Master’s Degree, BE/B.Tech, LLB, or Chartered Accountancy can apply online. The selection process includes online exams and interviews. Interested candidates are advised to read the official notification carefully before applying.

item.title: Bihar BSSC 4th Graduate Level Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Bihar Staff Selection Commission (BSSC) has released the official notification for the 4th Graduate Level Combined Competitive Examination 2025. This recruitment aims to fill 1481 vacancies across various departments of the Bihar Government. The posts include Assistant Branch Officer, Planning Assistant, Junior Statistical Assistant, Data Entry Operator (Grade-C), Auditor in the Finance Department, and Auditor in Cooperative Societies. Candidates must be graduates, with specific subject qualifications required for certain posts. The online application process will be open from 18 August to 19 September 2025. The selection will be done through a Preliminary Exam (objective type and open book with NCERT/BSEB textbooks), followed by a Main Exam and Document Verification. The application fee is ₹540 for General/BC/EBC (male) and outside Bihar candidates, and ₹135 for SC/ST, women (Bihar residents), and PwD candidates. Interested and eligible candidates can apply through the official BSSC website at https://bssc.bihar.gov.in.

item.title: Bihar BSSC Office Attendant / Attendant (Special) Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Bihar Staff Selection Commission (BSSC) has released the official notification for the recruitment of Office Attendant / Attendant (Special) posts under advertisement number 06/25. A total of 3727 vacancies have been announced across multiple departments of the Bihar government. Candidates who have passed the 10th (Matric) examination from a recognized board are eligible to apply. The online application process will begin on 25th August 2025 and remain open until 26th September 2025. The selection will be done through a preliminary objective-type written examination, followed by a main exam for shortlisted candidates. The minimum age limit is 18 years, and the upper age limit varies by category, with applicable relaxations. Reservation benefits will be given as per Bihar government rules, including 35% horizontal reservation for women and 4% for PwD candidates. The recruitment offers a Level-1 pay scale, and candidates are advised to read the full notification before applying online through the official BSSC website: https://bssc.bihar.gov.in.

item.title: Haryana Deen Dayal Lado Lakshmi Yojana 2025
item.description: हरियाणा सरकार ने 25 सितंबर 2025 से दीनदयाल लाड़ो लक्ष्मी योजना शुरू की है। इस योजना के तहत 23 वर्ष या उससे अधिक आयु की, वार्षिक आय ₹1 लाख से कम रखने वाली और राज्य में 15 साल से निवास कर रही महिलाओं को ₹2100 प्रतिमाह की वित्तीय सहायता सीधे बैंक खाते में दी जाएगी। सरकारी नौकरी करने वाली, आयकरदाता या अन्य सामाजिक सुरक्षा पेंशन लेने वाली महिलाएँ इस योजना के लिए पात्र नहीं होंगी। आवेदन प्रक्रिया पूरी तरह ऑनलाइन पोर्टल/ऐप से होगी और हर महीने फेस ऑथेंटिकेशन (लाइवनेस डिटेक्शन) जरूरी होगा। यह योजना महिलाओं को आर्थिक सुरक्षा प्रदान कर उन्हें आत्मनिर्भर बनाने का एक बड़ा प्रयास है।

item.title: LIC Golden Jubilee Scholarship 2025
item.description: The LIC Golden Jubilee Scholarship 2025 provides financial support to meritorious students from Economically Weaker Sections (EWS) for pursuing higher education in India. The scheme covers courses after Class 10 and 12, including Medical, Engineering, Graduation, Vocational, Diploma, and ITI programs. Scholarships are of two types: General Scholarship and Special Scholarship for Girls, with amounts ranging from ₹15,000 to ₹40,000 per annum. Selection is merit-based and income-sensitive, and the scholarship is credited directly to the student’s bank account.

item.title: Canara Bank Apprentice Vacancy 2025
item.description: Canara Bank invites online applications for 3500 Graduate Apprentice positions under the Apprentices Act, 1961 for FY 2025-26. Graduates in any discipline from a recognized university are eligible. Candidates must register on the NATS apprenticeship portal before applying on the Canara Bank website. Selection is based on shortlisting, local language test (if applicable), and document verification. Application dates are 23rd September to 12th October 2025, and fees are ₹500 for general/OBC/EWS while SC/ST/PwBD candidates are exempted.

item.title: Indian Bank Specialist Officers Vacancy 2025
item.description: Indian Bank has released the Specialist Officers Recruitment 2025 notification for 171 vacancies across 23 posts including IT, Information Security, Credit, Risk, Financial Analyst, Company Secretary, and Chartered Accountant. Online applications are open from 23 September to 13 October 2025. Application fee is ₹1000 for General/OBC/EWS and ₹175 for SC/ST/PWBD. Selection will be through Shortlisting + Interview or Online Test + Interview.

item.title: Delhi Police Constable Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Staff Selection Commission (SSC) has released the Delhi Police Constable (Executive) Recruitment 2025 notification for 7565 vacancies. Both male and female candidates can apply online from 22 September to 21 October 2025. The recruitment process includes a Computer-Based Examination, followed by Physical Endurance & Measurement Tests (PE&MT). Eligible candidates must have passed 10+2, and male applicants must hold a valid LMV driving license. The pay scale is Level-3 (₹21,700 – ₹69,100). Reserved categories and women candidates are exempted from the application fee.

item.title: MPESB Abkari Constable Answer Key 2025 Out
item.description:
MPESB -Excise Constable Direct and Backlog Post Recruitment Test - 2024

Madhya Pradesh Employee Selection Board (MPESB)

Short Details of Notification MPESB Abkari constable 2024

Important Dates

  • Application Begin: 15/02/2025
  • Last Date for Apply Online: 01/03/2025
  • Pay Exam Fee Last Date: 01/03/2025
  • Correction Last Date: 06/03/2025
  • Exam Start Date: 09/09/2025
  • Admit Card Available: 04/09/2025

Application Fee

  • General / Other State: 560/-
  • SC / ST / OBC: 310/-

  • Pay the Exam Fee Through Cash at KIOSK Or Pay Debit Card, Credit Card, Net Banking Fee Mode Only

Eligibility

  • Age limit as on 01/01/025

  • Minimum Age: 18 year
  • Maximum Age: 33 year

Age relaxation as per rules of MPESB Abkari constable 2024.

item.title: ECR Sports Quota Vacancy 2025
item.description: East Central Railway (ECR), Hajipur is recruiting 56 outstanding sportspersons under Sports Quota 2025-26 for various positions across HQ and five divisions. Vacancies cover sports like Wrestling, Basketball, Kabaddi, Football, Cricket, Badminton, Volleyball, and Hockey. Selection is based on sports trials and document verification. Candidates must meet the age, educational, and sports eligibility criteria. Applications are to be submitted offline before the last date.

item.title: EMRS Teaching & Non-Teaching Vacancy 2025
item.description: The National Education Society for Tribal Students (NESTS) has announced the EMRS Recruitment 2025 (ESSE-2025) notification for a total of 7267 vacancies across teaching and non-teaching posts. The vacancies include Principal, PGT, TGT, Female Staff Nurse, Hostel Warden, Accountant, Junior Secretariat Assistant (JSA), and Lab Attendant. Candidates can apply online until 23rd October 2025, with application fees ranging from ₹500 to ₹2500 depending on the post and category. The eligibility criteria vary by position, requiring qualifications from 10th/12th to Graduate, Postgraduate, B.Ed., CTET, or professional degrees. The age limit is set between 30 to 50 years, with applicable relaxations for reserved categories. This recruitment provides a major opportunity for aspirants seeking teaching and non-teaching jobs in Eklavya Model Residential Schools (EMRS) across India.

item.title: IBPS RRBs CRP XIV Vacancy 2025
item.description: IBPS has announced the CRP RRBs XIV Recruitment 2025-26 with 13217 vacancies for Office Assistants and Officers (Scale I, II & III) in Regional Rural Banks. Online applications are open from 1st to 21st September 2025 at ibps.in

item.title: MHA Intelligence Bureau ACIO Answer Key 2025
item.description: The Intelligence Bureau (IB), under the Ministry of Home Affairs (MHA), has announced the recruitment of 3717 posts for Assistant Central Intelligence Officer (ACIO) Grade-II / Executive. This is a Group ‘C’, Non-Gazetted, and Non-Ministerial post offering candidates a prestigious opportunity to work with India’s internal intelligence agency. Applicants must possess a Bachelor’s Degree in any stream from a recognized university in India. The selection process involves a written examination followed by an interview. Eligible candidates can apply online through the official MHA website.

item.title: Union Bank SO (Wealth Manager) Vacancy Admit Card 2025
item.description: Union Bank of India has announced the Wealth Manager Recruitment 2025 for 250 Specialist Officer (MMGS-II) vacancies. The post offers a pay scale of ₹64,820–₹93,960 plus allowances, with an approximate CTC of ₹21 lakh in Mumbai. Candidates must be between 25 and 35 years of age as on 1 August 2025, hold a full-time 2-year MBA/MMS/PGDBA/PGDBM/PGPM/PGDM from a recognized institution, and have at least 3 years of experience in Wealth Management at the Officer/Manager level. Desirable certifications include NISM, IRDAI, NCFM, or AMFI. The application process will be open from 5 August to 25 August 2025, with fees of ₹177 for SC/ST/PwBD candidates and ₹1,180 for others. The selection process may include an online examination, group discussion, and personal interview. Selected candidates will serve a probation period of 2 years and must sign a service bond to serve the bank for a minimum of 3 years or pay ₹2,50,000 plus taxes if leaving early.

item.title: RSSB Lab Attendant Vacancy Exam Date 2025
item.description: The Rajasthan Staff Selection Board (RSSB) has released the notification for Lab Attendant (Prayogshala Sahayak) Recruitment 2025. Eligible candidates can apply online through the official website. This recruitment is a great opportunity for 10th pass candidates seeking government jobs in Rajasthan. Applicants must have a valid domicile of Rajasthan to claim reservation benefits; candidates from other states can apply under the unreserved category (UR). The selection process will include a written examination followed by document verification. Interested candidates are advised to read the official notification carefully and apply before the last date.

item.title: RSSB Village Development Officer VDO 2025 Exam Date
item.description: राजस्थान कर्मचारी चयन बोर्ड (RSSB) द्वारा ग्राम विकास अधिकारी (VDO) पदों पर भर्ती के लिए अधिसूचना जारी कर दी गई है। इच्छुक और पात्र उम्मीदवार जो भारत के किसी भी मान्यता प्राप्त विश्वविद्यालय से स्नातक हैं और जिनके पास O लेवल, COPA, DPCS, कंप्यूटर डिप्लोमा या RS-CIT प्रमाण पत्र है, वे इस भर्ती के लिए ऑनलाइन आवेदन कर सकते हैं। भर्ती से जुड़ी पात्रता, आयु सीमा, आवेदन तिथि, चयन प्रक्रिया और अन्य जानकारी के लिए आधिकारिक नोटिफिकेशन जरूर पढ़ें।

item.title: UPPSC Assistant Teacher Bharti 2025 Exam Date Out
item.description: The Directorate of Medical Education and Research (DMER) has announced a recruitment drive for 7466 Assistant Teacher posts. Candidates must hold a Bachelor’s Degree in the relevant subject from any recognized university in India. Detailed eligibility criteria and subject-wise qualifications will be released soon. Interested applicants are advised to stay updated with the official notification and prepare to apply online as per the given schedule.

item.title: RPSC Assistant Professor Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Rajasthan Public Service Commission (RPSC) has announced the recruitment for 574 Assistant Professor posts in the College Education Department across 30 subjects, including Hindi, English, Sanskrit, Botany, Chemistry, Geography, Political Science, and more. The recruitment notification, Advt. No. 10/Exam/Assistant Professor/College Education/EP-1/2025-26, was released on 18th September 2025. Interested candidates can apply online from 20th September 2025 to 19th October 2025 through the official RPSC website or the SSO portal. Applicants must have a Master’s degree in the relevant subject with at least 55% marks along with NET/SLET/SET qualification or a Ph.D. as per UGC regulations. The age limit is 21 to 40 years, with relaxation applicable for reserved categories. The selection will be made based on a written examination scheduled between 1st and 24th December 2025, followed by an interview. Selected candidates will receive a pay level 10 (₹56,100 – ₹1,77,500) with AGP 6000. The application fees are ₹600 for General category and ₹400 for reserved/PwD candidates.

item.title: MP Police ASI & Subedar Stenographer Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Madhya Pradesh Police Headquarters has announced 500 vacancies for Subedar (Stenographer) and Assistant Sub Inspector (Clerk) posts under direct and departmental recruitment. Eligible candidates with 12th pass and computer proficiency (CPCT/Hindi Typing) can apply online via MPESB from 03 October to 17 October 2025. The written exam will start on 10 December 2025. Reservation benefits and age relaxation are applicable only for MP domicile candidates.

item.title: MPESB MP Police Constable Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Madhya Pradesh Professional Examination Board (MPESB) has announced the MP Police Constable Recruitment 2025 for a total of 7500 Constable (General Duty – SAF & DEF) posts. The online application process will start from 15/09/2025 and remain open till 29/09/2025, while the correction window will be available up to 04/10/2025. The written examination is scheduled to begin from 30/10/2025. Candidates applying for this recruitment must have passed 10th/12th (for UR/SC/OBC/EWS) or at least 8th standard (for ST candidates) from a recognized board. The minimum age limit is 18 years and the maximum is 33 years for general category male candidates, with age relaxations applicable for reserved categories and women as per rules. The application fee is ₹500 for UR, ₹250 for SC/ST/OBC/EWS (MP domicile), while departmental candidates need to pay ₹200 (UR) or ₹100 (reserved categories) along with applicable portal charges. This recruitment offers a great opportunity for candidates seeking a stable government job in the Madhya Pradesh Police Department.

item.title: MPESB Paramedical Admit Card 2025 Download
item.description: MP Employees Selection Board (MPESB) has announced the Paramedical Recruitment 2025 for a total of 464 posts. The recruitment includes vacancies for Physiotherapist, Counselor, Pharmacist Grade-II, and Ophthalmic Assistant. Eligible candidates can apply online from 28 July 2025 to 11 August 2025 through the official portal esb.mp.gov.in. The selection will be based on an online examination scheduled to begin from 27 September 2025. Candidates are advised to check the post-wise qualifications, age limit, and other details before applying.

item.title: SIDBI Assistant Manager Grade A & B Result 2025
item.description: Small Industries Development Bank of India (SIDBI) has released the official notification for the recruitment of Assistant Manager Grade A (General) and Manager Grade B (General, Legal, IT) posts, with a total of 76 vacancies. This is a great opportunity for candidates holding a Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in fields like Commerce, Economics, Law, Engineering, Management, or related disciplines. A minimum of 5 years of relevant experience is required for all Grade B positions. The application process will be conducted online, and the postings will be pan-India. Interested candidates are advised to visit the official website www.sidbi.in to check complete details and apply. For eligibility criteria, experience requirements, and selection procedure, please refer to the official notification.

item.title: Indian Bank Apprentice Admit Card 2025 Download
item.description: Indian Bank has invited online applications for the engagement of 1500 Apprentices under the Apprentices Act, 1961 for the financial year 2025–26. Candidates who hold a graduate degree in any discipline and have passed on or after 01 April 2021 are eligible to apply. The age of applicants must be between 20 to 28 years as on 01 July 2025, with relaxation applicable for reserved categories. The application process is online, and the registration window is open from 18 July 2025 to 07 August 2025. Selected candidates will undergo one year of apprenticeship training at various Indian Bank branches across the country. The selection will be based on a written examination followed by local language proficiency verification.

item.title: Indian Oil IOCL Apprentice Vacancy 2025
item.description: IOCL has invited online applications for 537 Apprentice vacancies in its Pipelines Division under Advertisement No. PL/HR/ESTB/APPR (2025)-2. The application window is open from 29th August 2025 to 18th September 2025. Candidates with 12th Pass, ITI, Diploma, or Graduation qualifications can apply for various posts such as Technician Apprentice, Trade Apprentice (HR/Accountant), and Data Entry Operator. The selection will be purely merit-based on educational marks, followed by document verification and medical examination. There is no application fee for this recruitment.

item.title: Driving Licence Apply, Status Check & Download
item.description: ड्राइविंग लाइसेंस एक वैध और अनिवार्य दस्तावेज़ है जो व्यक्ति को कानूनी रूप से वाहन चलाने की अनुमति देता है। यह न केवल वाहन चालक की योग्यता को प्रमाणित करता है, बल्कि सड़क सुरक्षा और ट्रैफिक नियमों के पालन को भी सुनिश्चित करता है। लाइसेंस प्राप्त करने के लिए निर्धारित आयु, दस्तावेज़ और ड्राइविंग टेस्ट की प्रक्रिया होती है। यह पहचान पत्र के रूप में भी उपयोगी है और रोजगार के अवसरों को बढ़ावा देता है। आजकल इसकी ऑनलाइन आवेदन, स्थिति जांच और डाउनलोड प्रक्रिया सरल और सुविधाजनक हो गई है।

item.title: Gaon Ki Beti Scholarship Form 2025-26
item.description: गांव की बेटी छात्रवृत्ति योजना 2025-26 मध्यप्रदेश सरकार की एक विशेष पहल है, जिसका उद्देश्य ग्रामीण क्षेत्रों की लड़कियों को उच्च शिक्षा प्राप्त करने के लिए प्रोत्साहित करना है। इस योजना के तहत योग्य छात्राओं को मासिक आर्थिक सहायता दी जाती है, जिससे वे अपनी पढ़ाई के खर्च जैसे फीस, किताबें और स्टेशनरी आदि को पूरा कर सकें। पात्रता के लिए छात्रा की कक्षा 12वीं में न्यूनतम 60% अंक, ग्रामीण क्षेत्र की स्थायी निवासी होना, और वार्षिक पारिवारिक आय ₹2,00,000 से अधिक न होना आवश्यक है। यह योजना न केवल शैक्षणिक प्रोत्साहन, बल्कि महिला सशक्तिकरण और सामाजिक विकास में भी मदद करती है।

item.title: RRC NCR Prayagraj Apprentice Vacancy 2025
item.description: Railway Recruitment Cell (RRC), North Central Railway, Prayagraj has invited online applications for 1763 Act Apprentice vacancies under the Apprentices Act 1961. Eligible 10th + ITI pass candidates can apply from 18th September to 17th October 2025 at rrcpryj.org.

item.title: Rajasthan Police Constable Answer Key 2025 Out
item.description:
राजस्थान पुलिस कांस्टेबल भर्ती पात्रता मानदंड

राजस्थान पुलिस कांस्टेबल जीडी / ड्राइवर / बैंड नॉन टीएसपी 6939
  • राजस्थान सीईटी 10+2 स्तर परीक्षा उत्तीर्ण
  • भारत में किसी भी मान्यता प्राप्त बोर्ड से 10+2 इंटरमीडिएट परीक्षा
  • ड्राइवर पद के लिए: एलएमवी / एचएमवी ड्राइविंग लाइसेंस 01/01/2026 तक 1 वर्ष पुराना होना चाहिए

item.title: MP ITI Counseling 2025-26: FCFS Round Choice Filling And Registraion
item.description: मध्य प्रदेश आईटीआई 2025 के पंजीकरण प्रारंभ

item.title: ISRO Assistant Rajbhasha Vacancy 2025
item.description: ISRO has invited online applications for Assistant (Rajbhasha) posts through Advertisement No. SAC:02:2025. A total of 07 vacancies are available across ISRO Centres and IIST. Candidates must have a Graduation degree with 60% marks, along with Hindi typing speed of 25 w.p.m. and computer proficiency. The age limit is 18 to 28 years as on 02 October 2025. The online application process is open from 12 September 2025 to 02 October 2025. All candidates must pay ₹500 as the application fee, which will be refunded fully or partially depending on category. Selection will be done through a Written Test and Skill Test.

item.title: DSSSB Assistant Teacher (Primary) Vacancy 2025
item.description: Delhi Subordinate Services Selection Board (DSSSB) has released Notification No. 05/2025 for 1180 Assistant Teacher (Primary) posts. Eligible candidates can apply online from 17th September to 16th October 2025. Selection will be done through a computer-based examination.

item.title: SSC CGL Tier - I Admit Card 2025 – Download Link & Exam Date Notice
item.description: SSC CGL 2025 में आवेदन करने के लिए उम्मीदवार के पास किसी मान्यता प्राप्त विश्वविद्यालय से स्नातक डिग्री होना आवश्यक है। जूनियर स्टैटिस्टिकल ऑफिसर पद के लिए 10+2 स्तर पर गणित में न्यूनतम 60% अंक या स्नातक डिग्री में सांख्यिकी एक विषय होना चाहिए। स्टैटिस्टिकल इन्वेस्टिगेटर ग्रेड-II के लिए भी स्नातक में सांख्यिकी अनिवार्य विषय होना चाहिए। रिसर्च असिस्टेंट (NHRC) और अन्य सभी पदों के लिए किसी भी स्ट्रीम में स्नातक डिग्री मान्य है।

item.title: BHEL Artisan Vacancy 2025 Exam Date Out
item.description: Bharat Heavy Electricals Limited (BHEL) has announced 515 vacancies for Artisan Grade IV posts under various trades such as Fitter, Welder, Turner, Machinist, Electrician, Electronics Mechanic, and Foundryman for the year 2025. These vacancies are spread across multiple BHEL units like BAP, HPVP, HEEP, TP, and others. Candidates must have passed Class 10th along with ITI (NTC) and NAC in the respective trade. A minimum of 60% marks is required for General and OBC candidates, and 55% for SC/ST in both qualifications. This recruitment offers a great opportunity for skilled ITI holders to join one of India’s leading public sector enterprises.

item.title: Join Indian Coast Guard Navik/Yantrik CGEPT 2026 Admit Card Out
item.description: भारतीय तटरक्षक बल ने CGEPT 01/2026 और 02/2026 के तहत नविक (GD/DB) और यांत्रिक पदों पर कुल 520 पदों पर भर्ती निकाली है। योग्यता के अनुसार 10वीं, 12वीं (फिजिक्स/मैथ्स) या डिप्लोमा धारक उम्मीदवार आवेदन कर सकते हैं। सभी श्रेणियों के लिए रिक्तियां उपलब्ध हैं। आवेदन प्रक्रिया ऑनलाइन है।

item.title: ECIL Technical Officer Vacancy 2025
item.description: Electronics Corporation of India Limited (ECIL) has invited applications for 160 Technical Officer posts on contract basis through Advt. No. 17/2025. The contract is initially for 9 months and extendable up to 4 years based on project needs. Candidates with BE/B.Tech. in ECE, EEE, CSE, IT, Mechanical and related disciplines with minimum 1-year post-qualification experience are eligible. The salary ranges from ₹25,000 to ₹31,000 per month along with PF, TA/DA, paid leave and medical benefits. The selection will be done on the basis of academic marks, work experience and personal interview (no written exam). The online application window will remain open from 16th September to 22nd September 2025 at www.ecil.co.in

item.title: UPPSC APO Recruitment 2025
item.description: The Uttar Pradesh Public Service Commission (UPPSC) has released the official notification for Assistant Prosecution Officer (APO) Recruitment 2025 with 182 vacancies. Eligible candidates with a Law degree (LLB) can apply online from 16 September 2025 to 16 October 2025 through the UPPSC portal. The selection process includes Prelims, Mains, and Interview, followed by document verification and medical examination. Applicants must be between 21 to 40 years of age as on 1 July 2025. The pay scale ranges from Rs. 47,600 to Rs. 1,51,100, offering a great career opportunity for law graduates in Uttar Pradesh.

item.title: NFR Sports Quota Recruitment 2025
item.description: The Northeast Frontier Railway (NFR) has released the notification for Sports Quota Recruitment 2025-26 with a total of 56 vacancies across Level 1 to Level 5 posts. Eligible Indian sportspersons can apply online from 16 September 2025 to 15 October 2025. The recruitment is open in various sports disciplines including athletics, boxing, cricket, football, volleyball, weightlifting, basketball, archery, and more. Candidates will be selected based on their sports performance and trials, as no written exam will be conducted. The application fee is ₹500 for General candidates and ₹250 for SC/ST/Women/Minority/EBC, with partial refund available after appearing in trials.

item.title: IB Security Assistant/Executive Exam City 2025
item.description: The Intelligence Bureau (IB), under the Ministry of Home Affairs (MHA), has released a notification for the recruitment of Security Assistant/Executive posts for the year 2025. A total of 4987 vacancies are available across various states and Union Territories. Candidates must have passed 10th standard, possess knowledge of the local language/dialect, and hold a domicile certificate of the region applied for. The post offers a Level-3 pay scale (₹21,700 – ₹69,100) along with special allowances. This is a central government Group ‘C’ non-gazetted, non-ministerial post, offering job security and growth in the intelligence sector. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online through the official portal before the last date.

item.title: Indian Airforce Agniveervayu Intake 02/2026 Exam City 2025
item.description: The Indian Air Force has released the notification for Agniveervayu Intake 02/2026 under the Agnipath Scheme. Eligible male and female candidates can apply online for the Agniveer Vayu post. The recruitment is open to candidates from both science and non-science backgrounds. Selection will be based on an online test, physical fitness test, and medical examination.

item.title: Rajasthan Police Constable Sports Quota Vacancy 2025
item.description: Rajasthan Police has announced 167 Constable vacancies under the Sports Quota for 2025. Eligible candidates who cleared the Senior Secondary Level CET 2024 can apply online from 12/09/2025 to 01/10/2025. The selection will be based on CET score, sports achievements, and physical standards. Applications can be submitted via E-Mitra kiosks, CSC centers, or the Rajasthan Police website.

item.title: RRB Section Controller Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Railway Recruitment Board (RRB) has announced 368 vacancies for Section Controller posts through CEN 04/2025. The online application process will be open from 15 September to 14 October 2025. Candidates with a graduation degree and age between 20 to 33 years can apply. Selection will be based on a Computer-Based Test, skill test (if required), document verification, and medical examination. The post offers a Level 6 pay scale with attractive allowances.

item.title: MPESB Candidate Profiling / Profile Panjiyan Form Online
item.description: To apply for any government recruitment under the Madhya Pradesh Employees Selection Board (MPESB), all candidates must complete the Candidate Profile Registration process. This is a one-time mandatory step where applicants register using Aadhaar eKYC, upload personal and academic details, and receive a unique Profile ID. This ID is required for all future MPESB applications. The process is simple, online, and essential for anyone seeking government jobs in Madhya Pradesh.

item.title: SBI Clerk (Junior Associate) Prelims Admit Card 2025 Out
item.description: State Bank of India (SBI) has released the official notification for Junior Associate (Customer Support & Sales) recruitment under Advertisement No. CRPD/CR/2025-26/06. A total of 5583 vacancies have been announced, including 5180 regular and 403 backlog posts, to be filled across various states. The online application process will be open from 06 August to 26 August 2025. Candidates must hold a graduation degree in any discipline, with final year students also eligible to apply provisionally. The age limit is 20 to 28 years as on 01 April 2025, with age relaxation applicable as per government rules. The selection process includes an online Preliminary Exam, Main Exam, and a Local Language Proficiency Test (if applicable). The Preliminary exam is expected in September 2025, and the Main exam in November 2025. The starting basic salary is ₹26,730/-, with gross monthly emoluments of around ₹46,000/- in metro cities. The application fee is ₹750/- for General/OBC/EWS, while it is exempted for SC/ST/PwBD/Ex-servicemen. Selected candidates will be posted in the state/circle they apply for, and no inter-state transfer will be allowed. Interested candidates can apply online through the SBI official website: https://sbi.co.in/web/careers.

item.title: UP Police Sub Inspector SI Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Uttar Pradesh Police Recruitment and Promotion Board (UPPRPB) has announced the UP Police Sub Inspector (SI) Recruitment 2025. The online application process will be open from 12 August 2025 to 11 September 2025, and fee adjustments for submitted payments can be made until 13 September 2025. The application fee is ₹500/- for General, EWS, and OBC candidates, while SC and ST candidates will have to pay ₹400/-. The recruitment is for posts in Uttar Pradesh, and applications must be submitted online.

item.title: IOCL Junior Engineer Vacancy 2025
item.description: IOCL Junior Engineer / Officer (Grade E0) Recruitment 2025 invites applications from Indian nationals with a 3-year diploma in Chemical, Mechanical, Electrical, or Instrumentation Engineering. Candidates must meet the minimum marks criteria (65% for General/EWS/OBC-NCL, 55% for SC/ST/PwBD) and age limits as per category. The selection process includes a Computer Based Test (CBT), followed by document verification and medical examination. Online applications start on 12/09/2025 and close on 28/09/2025. Pay scale for the post is ₹30,000 – ₹1,20,000/-. Reserved category candidates may have relaxations in age and marks.

item.title: IOB Specialist Officers Vacancy Online Form 2025
item.description: Indian Overseas Bank (IOB) has released a notification for the recruitment of 127 Specialist Officers in MMG Scale II & III across various departments, including IT, Risk, Information Security, Treasury, Corporate Credit, Software Engineering, and Data Science. Eligible candidates can apply online from 12.09.2025 to 03.10.2025 at www.iob.in. Age, educational qualifications, and post-qualification experience will be considered as on 01.09.2025. Reservation for SC, ST, OBC, EWS, and PwBD candidates will be as per Government norms. Application fees are ₹1000 for General/OBC/EWS and ₹175 for SC/ST/PwBD candidates.

item.title: SBI Manager (Credit Analyst) Vacancy Online Form 2025
item.description: The State Bank of India (SBI) has released the SCO Recruitment 2025 notification for 63 Manager (Credit Analyst) posts in MMGS-III. Eligible candidates with MBA (Finance)/CA/CFA/ICWA and minimum 3 years’ corporate credit experience can apply online from 11th September to 2nd October 2025. Selection will be through shortlisting and interview, with postings anywhere in India.

item.title: Army AFMS Medical Officer Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Indian Army Armed Forces Medical Services (AFMS) has announced 225 vacancies for Short Service Commission (SSC) Medical Officers in 2025. Eligible MBBS/PG candidates can apply online at join.afms.gov.in between 13 September and 3 October 2025. Selection will be based on NEET PG scores, interview, and medical tests.

item.title: RRC SR Sports Quota Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Railway Recruitment Cell (Southern Railway) has released the Sports Quota Recruitment 2025 for Level 1 to 5 posts, with a total of 67 vacancies. Candidates with educational qualifications ranging from 10th Pass/ITI to Graduate are eligible to apply depending on the post. The age limit for applicants is 18–25 years as of 1 January 2026, with age relaxation as per government rules. The application fee is Rs 500 for General/OBC/EWS and Rs 250 for SC/ST/PWD/ESM/Female candidates, which is refundable. Interested candidates must apply online through the official website rrcmas.in. The application process starts on 13 September 2025 and closes on 12 October 2025, while the trials date will be notified later.

item.title: BPSC Lower Division Clerk LDC Admit Card 2025
item.description: The Bihar Public Service Commission (BPSC) has released a notification for the recruitment of Lower Division Clerk (LDC) posts with a total of 26 vacancies. Candidates who have passed Intermediate (10+2) in any stream from a recognized board and possess computer operation and typing skills are eligible to apply. This recruitment is primarily for domicile candidates of Bihar, who will receive reservation benefits as per their category. Candidates from other states can also apply but will be considered under the General (Unreserved) category only, without any reservation or age relaxation. The application process is completely online. Out of the total posts, 13 are for General, 3 for EWS, 4 for SC, 1 for ST, 2 for EBC, 2 for BC, and 1 for BC Female.

item.title: Azim Premji Foundation Scholarship 2025 – Online Application Begins
item.description: The Azim Premji Scholarship 2025 is a flagship initiative of the Azim Premji Foundation aimed at supporting girl students from disadvantaged backgrounds to continue their higher education. Under this program, eligible students receive ₹30,000 per year for the entire duration of their first undergraduate degree or diploma course (2–5 years) at recognized government or private colleges across India. To qualify, the applicant must have passed Class 10 and 12 as a regular student from a government school or college and secured admission in the first year of a UG or diploma course for the 2025–26 academic session. The scholarship is open to students from select states and union territories including Arunachal Pradesh, Assam, Bihar, Chhattisgarh, Jharkhand, Karnataka, Madhya Pradesh, Manipur, Meghalaya, Mizoram, Nagaland, Odisha, Puducherry, Rajasthan, Sikkim, Telangana, Tripura, Uttar Pradesh, and Uttarakhand. The application process for the Scholarship Cohort 2025 will begin on 10 September 2025, and candidates must submit documents like a passport-size photograph, Aadhaar card, and signature image. Importantly, there is no application fee, and students are advised to beware of fraud or impostors.

item.title: Yojna Portal Whatsapp Channel 200k Follower
item.description:
Yojna Portal

Your trusted source for government schemes and Jobs updates

item.title: SBI Manager & Deputy Manager Vacancy 2025
item.description: The State Bank of India (SBI) has announced the SBI SCO Recruitment 2025 for a total of 59 Specialist Cadre Officer vacancies on a regular basis, including the posts of Manager (MMGS-III) and Deputy Manager (MMGS-II) in the Digital Platforms domain. Candidates must hold a B.E./B.Tech. in IT, Computer Science, Electronics, Electrical, or related fields, or an MCA with at least 60% marks, while an MBA is preferred. Relevant work experience of 5 years for Manager and 3 years for Deputy Manager in Digital Payments, FinTech, CRM, or related fields is mandatory. The age limit is 28–35 years for Manager and 25–32 years for Deputy Manager (as on 31.08.2025). The application fee is ₹750 for General, OBC, and EWS candidates, while SC, ST, and PwBD candidates are exempted. The selection process will be based on shortlisting and interview. Eligible candidates can apply online from 11th September to 2nd October 2025 through the official SBI Careers website.

item.title: IOCL NR Apprentice Vacancy 2025
item.description: Indian Oil Corporation Limited (IOCL), Marketing Division – Northern Region, has announced 523 Apprentice vacancies for 2025. The application window is open from 12 September to 11 October 2025. Eligible candidates with ITI, Diploma, or Graduation qualifications can apply online. Selection will be based on merit, document verification, and medical examination, with no application fee for any category.

item.title: Ladli Bahna Yojana 2025 | 28th Kisht-Check Details
item.description: मुख्यमंत्री लाड़ली बहना योजना मध्य प्रदेश सरकार द्वारा शुरू की गई एक सामाजिक और आर्थिक सशक्तिकरण योजना है, जिसके तहत राज्य की पात्र महिलाओं को प्रतिमाह ₹1500 की आर्थिक सहायता सीधे उनके बैंक खाते में दी जाती है, जिससे वे आत्मनिर्भर बन सकें।

item.title: BOM Specialist Officer Vacancy 2025
item.description: Bank of Maharashtra has announced Specialist Officer Recruitment 2025 (Phase II) for Scale II to VI posts in IT, Credit, Legal, Risk, Treasury, and other departments. Online applications are open from 10th to 30th September 2025.

item.title: RRC ER Sports Quota Vacancy 2025
item.description: RRC Eastern Railway has announced 50 vacancies under Sports Quota Recruitment 2025-26 for Group C and D posts. Eligible sportspersons can apply online from 10th September to 9th October 2025, and selection will be through field trials and document verification.

item.title: RBI Officer Grade B Vacancy 2025
item.description: Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has announced 120 vacancies for Grade B Officers in General, DEPR, and DSIM streams. The application window will remain open from 10 September to 30 September 2025. Phase I examination is scheduled on 18–19 October 2025, while Phase II will be held on 6–7 December 2025. Candidates must carefully read the official notification for detailed eligibility criteria, qualifications, age limit, and application fees before applying online.

item.title: Promotion or Ads on Whatsapp Channel Terms
item.description:
Terms & Conditions for WhatsApp Promotion

1. Single Posting Rule:

We will post your content only once. If the post/link is correct, functional, and free from errors, it will neither be modified nor reposted again.

2. Posting Duration:

The post/link you provide will be shared on our channel for a fixed duration of 24-48 hours only.

3. Right to Update New Posts:

30 minutes after your post or link is shared, we reserve the right to update new posts on our channel.

item.title: RRC SR Scouts & Guides Quota Vacancy 2025
item.description: Southern Railway and Integral Coach Factory (ICF) invite applications from Indian citizens who are active members of Bharat Scouts & Guides for recruitment to Level-1 posts under the Scouts & Guides Quota for the year 2025-26. A total of 14 posts are available—12 in Southern Railway (2 posts each in Chennai, Tiruchchirappalli, Madurai, Palakkad, Thiruvananthapuram, and Salem) and 2 in ICF. Candidates must have a minimum educational qualification of 10th pass, ITI, or National Apprenticeship Certificate (NAC) from NCVT. The age limit varies by category: UR 18–33 years, OBC 18–36 years, and SC/ST 18–38 years as on 01-01-2026. The selection process includes a Written Test / Computer Based Test (CBT). The application fee is Rs. 500 for general candidates and Rs. 250 for reserved categories, refundable after appearing in the exam. These posts are open to all communities, and eligible candidates can apply online from 30.08.2025 to 29.09.2025.

item.title: MPPEB Group-2 Sub Group-3 Various Posts Vacancy 2025
item.description: The MPESB has announced Group-2 Sub Group-3 Recruitment 2025 for a total of 339 posts in multiple departments including Food, Dairy, Medical, Municipal Corporations, and Pollution Control Board. The online application process is open for eligible candidates, with different qualifications required depending on the post. Interested applicants can check the detailed notification for eligibility, age limit, fees, and post-wise vacancy before applying online.

item.title: Railway RRB Group D Exam Date 2025
item.description: Railway Recruitment Board (RRB) has officially announced the RRB Group D Exam Date 2025. The CBT will be conducted from 17 November 2025 to the end of December 2025. City intimation slips will be released around 10 days before the exam and admit cards will be available 4 days prior. Candidates must regularly check their respective RRB regional websites for latest updates and instructions.

item.title: BPSC Assistant Public Sanitation & Waste Management Officer Vacancy 2025
item.description: Bihar Public Service Commission (BPSC) invites online applications for 54 posts of Assistant Public Sanitation & Waste Management Officer under the Department of Urban Development & Housing, Bihar. Candidates from all states of India, both male and female, are eligible. Required qualifications include a Bachelor’s degree in Chemistry/Environmental Science, B.E./B.Tech in Chemical/Civil/Environmental Science/Public Health Engineering/Biotechnology, or a degree in Planning/Architecture. Age limit (as of 01.08.2025) is 21–37 years for unreserved males, 21–40 years for unreserved females/OBC/EBC, and 21–42 years for SC/ST. Application fee is ₹100 (plus ₹200 biometric fee if Aadhaar is not provided). Apply online between 05.09.2025 and 30.09.2025 at www.bpsc.bihar.gov.in

item.title: Reliance Foundation Scholarships 2025-26
item.description: Reliance Foundation Scholarships 2025–26 support talented Indian students pursuing Undergraduate (UG) and Postgraduate (PG) programs. Scholarships provide financial aid up to ₹2,00,000 for UG and ₹6,00,000 for PG students, along with mentorship, networking, workshops, internships, and volunteering opportunities. Eligible students must be first-year learners in full-time regular courses, meet academic criteria, and complete a mandatory online aptitude test. Last date to apply: 4th October 2025 via the official Reliance Foundation Scholarships portal.

item.title: NPCT DBT 2025: Benefits, Purpose, and Complete Guide
item.description: NPCT DBT (National Payments Corporation of India – Direct Benefit Transfer) enables the Indian government to transfer subsidies, pensions, scholarships, and other benefits directly to beneficiaries’ bank accounts. It ensures fast, secure, and transparent payments by linking beneficiaries’ Aadhaar numbers with their bank accounts. Payments can be tracked via bank statements, the DBT Bharat Portal, or the UMANG app. This system covers various schemes such as LPG subsidies, MGNREGA wages, farmer support, pensions, and student scholarships.

item.title: Bihar PCS 71st Admit Card 2025 Out
item.description: बिहार लोक सेवा आयोग (BPSC) ने 71वीं संयुक्त प्रतियोगिता परीक्षा (CCE) 2025 का नोटिफिकेशन जारी कर दिया है। यह परीक्षा विभिन्न प्रशासनिक पदों जैसे DSP, SDM, बीडीओ, राजस्व अधिकारी आदि के लिए आयोजित की जाती है। आवेदन प्रक्रिया ऑनलाइन मोड में होगी और सभी भारत के योग्य उम्मीदवार आवेदन कर सकते हैं।

item.title: SCI Assistant Manager & Executive Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Shipping Corporation of India Ltd. (SCI) has invited applications for 75 vacancies of Assistant Manager (E2) and Executive (E0). The online application process will run from 06 September 2025 to 27 September 2025. Maximum age limit is 27 years (with relaxations as per Govt. norms). The selection process includes Online Test, Group Discussion, and Personal Interview. Application fee is ₹500 for UR/OBC-NCL/EWS and ₹100 for SC/ST/PwBD/ESM. Interested candidates can apply online through the official website shipindia.com

item.title: Indian Oil Engineers/Officers Vacancy 2025
item.description: Indian Oil Corporation Limited (IOCL) has announced recruitment for Engineers/Officers (Grade A) in Chemical, Electrical, and Instrumentation disciplines through CBT 2025. Eligible candidates with B.Tech./B.E. degrees can apply online from 05/09/2025 to 21/09/2025, admit card will be available from 17/10/2025, and the CBT will be held on 31/10/2025.

item.title: IB Security Assistant Motor Transport Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Intelligence Bureau (IB) has invited online applications for 455 Security Assistant (Motor Transport) posts under the Ministry of Home Affairs. Eligible 10th pass candidates with a valid LMV driving license can apply from 6 to 28 September 2025. The selection will be based on an online exam, driving test, and interview, with a salary of ₹21,700–69,100 plus allowances.

item.title: RSSB Patwari Bharti 2025 Answer Key Out
item.description: Rajasthan Staff Selection Board (RSMSSB) has released the notification for Patwari Bharti 2025. A total of 3705 vacancies are available, including 522 posts for TSP areas and 3183 posts for Non-TSP areas. Candidates must have a Bachelor’s Degree and a recognized Computer qualification such as NIELIT O Level, COPA, RS-CIT, or a Diploma/Degree in Computer Science/Application.

item.title: HDFC Scholarship 2025-26
item.description: HDFC Bank Parivartan’s ECSS Scholarship 2025-26 is a financial assistance programme aimed at helping meritorious students from economically weaker sections continue their education without interruption. The scholarship is open for school students (Class 1 to 12), as well as those pursuing diploma, ITI, polytechnic, undergraduate, and postgraduate courses. Under this initiative, eligible students facing financial challenges, family crises, or risk of dropout can receive support of up to INR 75,000. The programme ensures that bright and deserving students get equal opportunities to pursue their academic goals and build a successful future.

item.title: RRB Paramedical Various Posts Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Railway Recruitment Board (RRB), Ministry of Railways, Government of India, has released the Centralized Employment Notice (CEN No. 03/2025) for Paramedical Categories Recruitment 2025 with a total of 434 vacancies across various posts including Nursing Superintendent, Pharmacist, Dialysis Technician, ECG Technician, Radiographer, and Lab Assistant. The online application process will begin on 09 August 2025 and will remain open until 08 September 2025 (11:59 PM). The educational qualifications vary by post, ranging from 10+2 with Diploma/Certificate to B.Sc. in relevant fields, and the age limit is 18 to 40 years as on 01 January 2026. The selected candidates will receive a salary ranging between ₹21,700 and ₹44,900 as per the 7th CPC Pay Matrix (Level 2 to Level 7). The selection process will consist of a Computer Based Test (CBT), Document Verification, and a Medical Examination. Candidates can apply through the official RRB regional websites such as rrbahmedabad.gov.in and others.

item.title: Indian Coast Guard Assistant Commandant AC Exam City & Exam Date 2025
item.description: The Indian Coast Guard has released the notification for Assistant Commandant Recruitment 2025. A total of 170 vacancies are available under two main branches: General Duty (GD) with 140 posts and Technical (Engineering/Electrical) with 30 posts. Eligible male candidates with a graduate degree and Physics & Maths at 10+2 level can apply for GD, while candidates with an engineering degree in relevant disciplines can apply for the Technical branch. The application process is online through the official website joinindiancoastguard.cdac.in. This is a prestigious Group ‘A’ Gazetted Officer post under the Ministry of Defence, Government of India.

item.title: UPSC CDS II Admit Card 2025 Out
item.description: Combined Defence Services (CDS) II Exam 2025

item.title: UPSC NDA 2 Admit Card 2025 Out
item.description: UPSC National Defence Academy and Naval Academy NDA II Examination 2025 Apply Online Form

item.title: UPSC EPFO Exam Date 2025
item.description: The Union Public Service Commission (UPSC) has released the Special Advertisement No. 52/2025 for direct recruitment to a total of 230 vacancies in the Employees’ Provident Fund Organisation (EPFO) under the Ministry of Labour and Employment. These include 156 posts of Enforcement Officer/Accounts Officer (EO/AO) and 74 posts of Assistant Provident Fund Commissioner (APFC). Candidates must hold a Bachelor’s Degree from a recognized university. For the APFC post, qualifications such as a degree in Law, MBA, CA, or equivalent are desirable. The online application process will begin on July 29, 2025, and close on August 18, 2025. Selection will be based on a written examination, and postings will be across India. Interested candidates can apply online at https://upsconline.nic.in.

item.title: UPPSC Assistant Professor Vacancy 2025
item.description: UPPSC has announced Assistant Professor Recruitment 2025 for 1253 posts in Government Degree Colleges. Online applications are open from 4 September to 6 October 2025. Candidates with a PG degree and UGC-NET can apply

item.title: SBI Probationary Officers PO Mains Admit Card 2025 Out
item.description: The State Bank of India (SBI) has released the notification for the recruitment of 541 Probationary Officer (PO) posts, including 500 regular posts and 41 backlog posts. Candidates must have a Bachelor’s degree in any stream from a recognized university in India to be eligible. The category-wise distribution of vacancies is as follows: UR – 203, OBC – 135, EWS – 50, SC – 80, and ST – 73. The application process will be conducted online through the official SBI website at sbi.co.in. This is a golden opportunity for graduates seeking a prestigious career in banking with SBI.

item.title: RPSC 1st Grade Teacher Agriculture Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Rajasthan Public Service Commission (RPSC) has announced the RPSC 1st Grade Teacher (Agriculture) Recruitment 2025 for a total of 500 posts of School Lecturer in the Secondary Education Department. Candidates must have a 4-year Bachelor’s degree in Agriculture or Horticulture, a Postgraduate degree in the relevant subject, and a B.Ed. from an NCTE-recognized institution, along with knowledge of Hindi in Devanagari script and Rajasthani culture. The online application process will be open from 4th September to 3rd October 2025, with the written examination expected between 31st May and 16th June 2026. The selection process will be based on a written test, document verification, and medical examination, and the post carries a salary under Pay Matrix Level L-12 with Grade Pay ₹4800.

item.title: Rajasthan Sub Inspector Vacancy 2025 Apply Online
item.description: Rajasthan Public Service Commission (RPSC) has released the official notification for Rajasthan Police SI and Platoon Commander Recruitment 2025-26 under advertisement number 05/Exam/SI-PC/RPSC/EP-I/2025-26. A total of 1015 vacancies have been announced for various posts including Sub Inspector (AP, IB, Sahariya, Scheduled Area) and Platoon Commander (RAC). Candidates holding a graduate degree and having knowledge of Hindi in Devanagari script and Rajasthani culture are eligible to apply. The online application process will begin on 10 August 2025 and the last date to apply is 08 September 2025. Applicants from all states of India can apply for general posts, while certain reserved posts are limited to Rajasthan domicile candidates only.

item.title: JNV Class IX Admission Form 2026-27
item.description: Jawahar Navodaya Vidyalaya Samiti (NVS) has invited applications for Class IX Lateral Entry Admission 2026-27 against vacant seats through a selection test. The exam will be conducted on 7th February 2026 at designated JNVs of respective districts. Eligible students studying in Class VIII during 2025-26 in Government or Government-recognized schools of the same district, and born between 1st May 2011 to 31st July 2013, can apply online at navodaya.gov.in till 23rd September 2025. Admission will be offered strictly on merit basis and is subject to passing Class VIII along with verification of residence, date of birth, and other required documents.

item.title: LIC Housing Finance Apprentice Vacancy 2025
item.description: LIC Housing Finance Limited (LIC HFL) has announced 192 Apprentice vacancies for graduates under a 12-month apprenticeship program. Candidates aged 20–25 years can apply online from 02/09/2025 to 22/09/2025. Selection will be through an online exam, document verification, and interview.

item.title: CSBC Bihar Constable Driver Exam Date Notice 2025
item.description: This recruitment has been announced by RailTel Corporation of India Limited for various posts, where candidates will be selected based on interview and document verification. Interested candidates who fulfill all the required qualifications and experience can apply online. The last date to apply is August 5, 2025. This is a great opportunity for candidates aspiring to build a career in the fields of Electronics, Telecom, IT, and Networking. Before applying, all candidates are advised to carefully read the official notification to avoid any mistakes.

item.title: MPESB Primary School Teacher Selection Test 2025 Exam Date
item.description: Madhya Pradesh Employees Selection Board (MPESB) has released the notification for the Primary School Teacher Selection Test 2025. A total of 10,150 Varg 3 Primary Teacher posts will be recruited under the School Education Department. Eligible candidates who have qualified the MP Primary TET 2020 or 2024 can apply online. Applicants must check the detailed eligibility, age limit, and other conditions in the official notification before applying. Candidates from outside MP can also apply but will not get any domicile reservation or relaxation benefits.

item.title: Oriental Insurance Assistant Vacancy 2025 Admit Card Out
item.description: Oriental Insurance Company Limited (OICL) has released the official notification for the recruitment of Assistants in 2025. Eligible candidates from across India can apply online through the official website. Applicants must hold a graduation degree, and the selection process includes a written examination followed by document verification. Interested candidates should submit their applications before the last date. Selected candidates will receive a competitive salary and will be posted across various locations in India.

item.title: ISRO SAC Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: SAC, ISRO Ahmedabad has invited online applications for 13 posts of Project Scientist-I and Project Associate-I under Advertisement No. SAC:01:2025. Eligible candidates can apply online from 02 September to 22 September 2025. Selection will be done through interviews in October–November 2025.

item.title: NHPC Non-Executive Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The NHPC Non-Executive Recruitment 2025 has been announced for 248 vacancies including Junior Engineers, Sr. Accountant, Supervisor (IT), Assistant Rajbhasha Officer, and Hindi Translator. Eligible candidates can apply online at www.nhpcindia.com from 2nd September to 1st October 2025. The selection will be through a Computer-Based Test (CBT)/Written Exam followed by document verification, with pay scales up to ₹1.40 lakh per month.

item.title: BPSC Polytechnic Department Head Vacancy 2025
item.description: Bihar Public Service Commission (BPSC) has announced 218 vacancies for the post of Department Head in Government and Women Polytechnic Colleges. Eligible candidates with the required academic qualifications and teaching/industry experience can apply online from 02 September 2025 to 30 September 2025. The minimum age is 33 years, there is no upper age limit, and the retirement age is 65 years.

item.title: BPSC Sports Officer Vacancy 2025
item.description: Bihar Public Service Commission (BPSC) has announced 33 vacancies for the posts of District Sports Officer, Assistant Director (Sports/Youth), and Lecturer (SH & Colleges) under the Bihar Sports Service Cadre through Advt. No. 90/2025. Candidates with a Graduate Degree and a Diploma/PG Diploma in Sports Coaching from a recognized institute are eligible to apply. The online application window will remain open from 02 September 2025 to 30 September 2025, and applicants need to pay a fee of ₹100/- plus bank charges. This is a good opportunity for candidates with sports coaching qualifications to build their career in the Bihar Sports Department.

item.title: Indian Navy SSC Officers Vacancy 2025 June 2026 Course
item.description: The Indian Navy is recruiting SSC Officers for Executive, Education, and Technical branches under the June 2026 course at INA Ezhimala. A total of 256 vacancies are open for eligible unmarried candidates. Applications will be accepted online from 9 August to 1 September 2025.

item.title: MPPGCL Vacancy 2025 Apply Online Form
item.description: Madhya Pradesh Power Generating Company Limited (MPPGCL) has released a recruitment notification for 346 vacancies across various posts including Assistant Engineer, Junior Engineer, Plant Assistant, Office Assistant, Stenographer, Fireman, Security Guard, and more. Candidates can apply online through the MPOnline portal from 23rd July 2025 to 21st August 2025. The selection process will be based on Computer Based Test (CBT), followed by Physical Test (for selected posts like Security Guard and Fireman) and Document Verification. Category-wise reservation is applicable only for the domicile candidates of Madhya Pradesh. Candidates from other states will be treated under the Unreserved (UR) category.

item.title: MP Pre Agriculture Test PAT 2025 Result
item.description: MPESB PAT 2025 (Pre Agriculture Test) मध्य प्रदेश कर्मचारी चयन मंडल द्वारा आयोजित एक राज्य स्तरीय प्रवेश परीक्षा है, जो कृषि से संबंधित स्नातक पाठ्यक्रमों जैसे B.Sc. Agriculture, Horticulture, Forestry आदि में प्रवेश के लिए होती है। इस परीक्षा के लिए केवल मध्य प्रदेश के मूल निवासी ही आवेदन कर सकते हैं। आवेदन प्रक्रिया ऑनलाइन मोड में होती है और परीक्षा कंप्यूटर आधारित (CBT) होती है। पात्रता के लिए आवेदक का 12वीं कक्षा उत्तीर्ण होना अनिवार्य है, जिसमें कृषि या विज्ञान विषय होना चाहिए।

item.title: MP ePravesh NCTE/PG/UG Admission 2025-26 Pahle Aao Pahle Pao Round
item.description:
MP Higher Education Department

MP ePravesh 2025: UG & PG College Admission 2025-26

Round- CLC Round

महत्वपूर्ण सूचना: सभी छात्रों से अनुरोध है कि प्रवेश प्रक्रिया शुरू करने से पहले आवश्यक दस्तावेज तैयार रखें। अधिक जानकारी के लिए अपने नजदीकी कॉलेज से संपर्क करें।

item.title: ECIL ITI Trade Apprentice Vacancy 2025
item.description: ECIL ITI Trade Apprentice Recruitment 2025: Electronics Corporation of India Limited (ECIL), Hyderabad has announced 412 Apprentice vacancies in various ITI trades. Eligible candidates from all over India, including females, can apply online from 01/09/2025 to 22/09/2025. Selection will be based on ITI merit and document verification, and training will begin on 01/11/2025 at ECIL Hyderabad, Telangana.

item.title: Bihar SHS Lab Technician Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The State Health Society, Bihar invites online applications for 1075 posts of Laboratory Technicians, including 1068 Lab Technician and 7 Senior Lab Technician (NTEP) vacancies. Candidates must have 10+2 (Physics, Chemistry, Biology) with DMLT/BMLT or relevant M.Sc./B.Sc. qualifications for senior posts. The selection will be based on a Computer-Based Test (CBT) followed by document verification. Application fees range from ₹125 to ₹500 depending on category. Salary offered is ₹15,000 for Lab Technician and ₹24,000 for Senior Lab Technician.

item.title: Naval Dockyard Apprentice Vacancy 2025
item.description: Naval Dockyard, Mumbai has released a notification for 286 Apprentice vacancies in various ITI and Non-ITI trades under the Apprentices Act 1961. Both male and female candidates from all states can apply online between 25th August 2025 and 12th September 2025 at https://applicationportal.in/ No application fee is required.

item.title: SCI Court Master (Shorthand) Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Supreme Court of India has announced 30 vacancies for Court Master (Shorthand) with a salary of ₹67,700/- (Level 11). Eligible graduates with shorthand (120 w.p.m.), typing (40 w.p.m.), and 5 years’ experience can apply online from 30 August to 15 September 2025 at www.sci.gov.in

item.title: RRC WCR Apprentice Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Railway Recruitment Cell (RRC), West Central Railway has announced 2,865 Apprentice vacancies under Notification No. 01/2025. The online application process will run from 30th August to 29th September 2025. Candidates must have passed 10th Class with at least 50% marks along with an ITI certificate (NCVT/SCVT) in the relevant trade. The age limit is 15 to 24 years with relaxation as per rules. Selection will be purely based on merit (10th + ITI marks). Application fee is ₹141 for UR/OBC/EWS and ₹41 for SC/ST/PwBD/Women. Interested candidates can apply online through the official website wcr.indianrailways.gov.in.

item.title: NEET PG Score Card 2025
item.description:
NEET पोस्ट ग्रेजुएट पीजी कोर्सेज प्रवेश 2025 : पात्रता और कोर्स विवरण

कोर्स का नाम NEET PG पात्रता 2025
एमडी/एमएस/पीजी डिप्लोमा
  • किसी भी मान्यता प्राप्त संस्थान से एमबीबीएस डिग्री।
  • अधिक जानकारी के लिए अधिसूचना पढ़ें।
डीएम/एमसीएच
  • संबंधित विषय में एमडी/एमएस डिग्री।
  • न्यूनतम 3 वर्ष का अनुभव।
डीएनबी
  • एमबीबीएस डिग्री।
  • नेशनल बोर्ड ऑफ एग्जामिनेशन द्वारा निर्धारित मानदंड।

आवेदन प्रक्रिया

  • ऑनलाइन आवेदन करें: आधिकारिक वेबसाइट पर पंजीकरण करें
  • आवश्यक दस्तावेज अपलोड करें
  • आवेदन शुल्क का भुगतान करें
  • सबमिट करें और पंजीकरण संख्या सहेज लें

item.title: RCFL Apprentice Vacancy 2025
item.description: Rashtriya Chemicals and Fertilizers Limited (RCFL) has announced 325 Apprentice vacancies for Graduate, Technician, and Trade categories. Eligible candidates with Graduation, Diploma, or 12th qualification can apply online till 12th September 2025. Selection will be done on a merit basis (marks in qualifying exam), with no written test.

item.title: BPSC Motor Vehicle Inspector MVI Answer Key 2025
item.description: बिहार लोक सेवा आयोग (BPSC) द्वारा विज्ञापन संख्या 41/2025 के अंतर्गत 28 मोटर वाहन निरीक्षक (MVI) पदों पर भर्ती का नोटिफिकेशन जारी किया गया है। अभ्यर्थियों के पास 10वीं पास की योग्यता, ऑटोमोबाइल या मैकेनिकल इंजीनियरिंग में डिप्लोमा तथा वैध हल्के मोटर वाहन (LMV) ड्राइविंग लाइसेंस होना आवश्यक है। ऑनलाइन आवेदन की अंतिम तिथि 3 जुलाई 2025 है।

item.title: BPSC ATP Assistant Town Planner Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Bihar Public Service Commission (BPSC) has announced 35 vacancies for Assistant Town Planner (ATP) under Advertisement No. 89/2025 in the Urban Development & Housing Department. The online application process will be open from 28th August 2025 to 22nd September 2025 on the official BPSC website. Candidates with a Post Graduate degree in Town Planning, Regional/Urban Planning, City Planning, Country/Transport Planning, Housing, or Environmental Planning are eligible to apply. The selection will be based on a written examination and interview, and appointed candidates will receive a salary under Pay Level 09 (₹53,100 – ₹1,67,800) along with allowances.

item.title: BPSC AES Assistant Environmental Scientist Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Bihar Public Service Commission (BPSC) has invited applications for 17 Assistant Environmental Scientist (AES) posts under the Department of Environment, Forest & Climate Change. Eligible candidates with a B.Sc./M.Sc. degree in Environmental Science, Chemistry, Physics, or Life Sciences can apply online from 27 August to 19 September 2025 at bpsc.bihar.gov.in. Selection will be through a written exam and interview.

item.title: AAI Junior Executive JE Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The application process for the recruitment will begin on 28 August 2025 and remain open until 27 September 2025. Interested and eligible candidates are advised to complete their registration within the given dates to avoid last-minute issues. Applicants should carefully read the official notification, check the eligibility criteria, and prepare the required documents before applying.

item.title: PowerGrid PGCIL Field Engineer & Supervisor Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Power Grid Corporation of India Limited (PGCIL) has invited applications for 1543 vacancies of Field Engineer and Field Supervisor under the 2025 recruitment drive. Candidates with a B.E./B.Tech/B.Sc in Engineering for Field Engineer posts or a Diploma in relevant discipline for Field Supervisor posts can apply online between 27 August to 17 September 2025. The selection process includes a written test for all posts and an interview for Field Engineers. With attractive pay, allowances, and growth opportunities, this is a great chance to build a career in one of India’s leading Maharatna PSUs under the Ministry of Power.

item.title: BOB Local Bank Officers LBO Admit Card 2025
item.description: Bank of Baroda (BOB) has announced 2500 vacancies for the post of Local Bank Officer (JMG/S-I) across multiple states. Candidates must hold a graduation degree in any discipline from a recognized university. Professional qualifications like CA, Engineering, or Medical are also accepted. Applicants must have at least 1 year of experience as an officer in a Scheduled Commercial Bank or Regional Rural Bank listed under the Second Schedule of the RBI. Experience in NBFCs, cooperative banks, and fintechs will not be considered. The recruitment is open state-wise with preference for candidates familiar with the local language.

item.title: Bihar BPSC AEDO Vacancy 2025
item.description: Bihar Public Service Commission (BPSC) has released the official notification for 935 Assistant Education Development Officer (AEDO) vacancies under the Education Department. The online application process will begin on 27 August 2025 and continue till 26 September 2025. Candidates with a graduate degree from a recognized university are eligible to apply. The salary will be as per Level-5 pay scale (₹29,200 + allowances). Applicants must pay an examination fee of ₹100/- plus bank charges through online mode. Interested candidates should visit the official website bpsc.bihar.gov.in to apply online and check detailed guidelines.

item.title: RPSC Junior Legal Officer (JLO) Vacancy 2025
item.description: RPSC has announced 12 vacancies for the post of Junior Legal Officer (JLO) in the Jaipur Development Authority (JDA) through notification number 11/Exam/JLO/JDA/EP-I/2025-26. Interested and eligible Law graduates can apply online between 27 August 2025 to 25 September 2025. The recruitment process includes a written examination and document verification. Candidates must carefully read the notification for eligibility, application fees, and reservation details before applying.

item.title: Oil India Limited Vacancy 2025
item.description: Oil India Limited, a Maharatna PSU, has released its Recruitment Notification 2025 for a total of 102 vacancies in Grade A, B, and C posts. The vacancies include positions such as Superintending Engineer, Senior Officers in various disciplines (Chemical, Civil, Electrical, Mechanical, IT, Petroleum, HR, Legal, Finance, Public Affairs, Geology, Geophysics, Electronics & Communication, Fire & Safety, HSE, Security, Company Secretary), along with Confidential Secretary and Hindi Officer. Both male and female candidates are eligible to apply. The application process is completely online, starting from 26 August 2025 and closing on 26 September 2025. Candidates will be selected through Computer Based Test (CBT), Personal Interview, and Skill/Proficiency Test as per the post. The recruitment offers attractive pay scales ranging from ₹50,000 to ₹2,20,000 plus allowances, making it a great opportunity for engineering and non-engineering graduates to build a career with Oil India Limited.

item.title: RRC SR Apprentices Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Railway Recruitment Cell, Southern Railway (RRC SR) has released the official notification for Apprentice Recruitment 2025, offering a total of 3518 apprenticeship slots across various workshops and divisions including Perambur, Golden Rock, Podanur, Chennai, Salem, Madurai, Palakkad, and Trivandrum. Eligible candidates who have passed 10th (50% marks), 12th with Science (for MLT trades), or ITI in relevant trades can apply online from 25 August 2025 to 25 September 2025. The selection will be based on a merit list prepared from academic and ITI marks. Apprentices will receive a stipend of ₹6,000–₹7,000 per month during training. This engagement is purely for apprenticeship training under the Apprentices Act, 1961, and does not guarantee direct employment, though preference will be given in future railway recruitments to candidates who complete the training successfully.

item.title: MP Keerti Card: Special Benefits and Recognition for Daughters
item.description: MP Keerti Card मध्य प्रदेश सरकार की एक विशेष पहल है, जो बेटियों वाले परिवारों को प्रोत्साहन और सम्मान देने के लिए शुरू की गई है। इस कार्ड के माध्यम से परिवारों को सरकारी सेवाओं में प्राथमिकता, शिक्षा व स्वास्थ्य सुविधाओं में छूट, और स्थानीय व्यापारों में विशेष लाभ मिलता है। इसका उद्देश्य लिंगानुपात सुधारना, बेटियों के प्रति सम्मान बढ़ाना और परिवारों को प्रोत्साहित करना है।

item.title: Federal Bank Associate Officer Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Federal Bank has invited applications for the post of Associate Officer (Sales) under its 2025 recruitment drive. The online application window is open from 25/08/2025 to 03/09/2025. Candidates must be graduates with at least 50% aggregate marks in Class X, Class XII/Diploma, and Graduation, and should also hold a valid two- or four-wheeler driving license. The upper age limit is 27 years (born on or after 01/08/1998), and applicants must be domiciled in Gujarat, Telangana, West Bengal, or Delhi NCR. An application fee of ₹350 (non-refundable) is payable online. The selection process consists of a center-based online aptitude test followed by a personal interview, with selected candidates placed on a one-year probation. The role offers a salary package between ₹4.59 and ₹6.19 LPA, along with additional benefits such as medical coverage, NPS, and career progression opportunities.

item.title: DSSSB Chauffeur & Process Server Vacancy 2025
item.description: DSSSB Recruitment 2025 (Advt. No. 04/2025) has been announced for 20 Group C posts of Chauffeur and Despatch Rider-cum-Process Server in Delhi High Court. Eligible 10th pass candidates with a valid driving license and 2 years’ experience can apply online from 26th August to 24th September 2025 at dsssbonline.nic.in.

item.title: DSSSB Delhi High Court Various Post Vacancy 2025
item.description: DSSSB has announced 334 vacancies under Advt No. 03/2025 for various posts in the Delhi High Court, including Security Attendant, Court Attendant, and Room Attendant. The online application process will run from 26 August to 24 September 2025. Candidates with 10th pass or ITI qualification are eligible to apply. The recruitment offers a Level-3 pay scale (₹21,700–₹69,100), with an application fee of ₹100 for General/OBC/EWS and exemptions for SC/ST/PwBD/Women/Ex-servicemen. Selection will be through a computer-based test and subsequent stages as per the post.

item.title: MPESB Excise Constable Exam Date 2025 - Check Schedule
